description.message: Finds the next URL and lets you + (increment) numbers in a URL

popup_next_input.description: Title (tool tip) for the increment button image when hovered.

popup_prev_input.description: Title (tool tip) for the decrement button image when hovered.

popup_clear_input.description: Title (tool tip) for the clear button image when hovered.

popup_setup_input.description: Title (tool tip) for the setup button image when hovered.

popup_url_legend.message: Select the part of the URL to modify

popup_selection_label.description: Form label for Selection input text.

popup_interval_label.description: Form label for Increment input number.

popup_selection_blank_error.description: Form error message if user does not select a part of the URL.

popup_selection_notinurl_error.message: Selection must be a part of the URL
popup_selection_notinurl_error.description: Form error message if user is somehow able to select something that isn't part of the URL.

popup_interval_blank_error.description: Form error message if user does not enter a number for Increment.

popup_interval_negative_error.message: Interval can't be a negative number

popup_interval_0_error.description: Form error message if user tries to enter zero for Increment.

options_shortcut_keys.description: The options page's shortcuts keys title.

options_shortcut_keys_enable_label.description: Label for Shortcut Keys checkbox to enable or disable them.

options_shortcut_keys_p.message: Click on the text boxes and then press the keys you want to assign as shortcuts. "Quick" shortcuts allow you to next (+) or prev (-) instantly without having to enter Setup.

options_default_settings_p.message: You can have URL Next Plus act with these defaults each time you use "Quick" shortcuts or enter Setup.

options_default_action_scan_page_option.message: Look for the next and prev links on the page

options_default_action_modify_url_option.message: Modify the URL and increment (+) or decrement (-)

options_save_disclaimer.message: Note: Changes you make are saved upon closing this dialog.
